p: To prove that the experiment did not react with other non-targeted viruses, specificity was determined by addition of target and non-target virus, including viral DNA or cDNA templates of Torque teno canine virus (TTCV), Canine influenza virus (H3N2 CIV), Canine distemper virus (CDV) and CPV, CCoV, CAstV, CaKoV and negative control to the reaction mix.
